summary: Expedition to Atmora - an arctic endeavour to the edge of the known world...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i65.tinypic.com/6y380z.jpg[/img]

[i]
[/i]
[b][i][/i][/b][b][i][size=6]"One of the few really big mods, I am waiting for"[/size] [/i][/b][i]Shinji72[/i]


[youtube]Yk0surHJ6Jw[/youtube]

Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5993230/?]Shinji72[/url]

Voiced by [url=https://vimeo.com/83359593]Michael Allen[/url]

[img]http://i65.tinypic.com/vrpn2r.jpg[/img]
[b]

[/b][b][size=4]What is Atmora? -> find out by clicking at:[/size][/b]
[b] [/b]
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Atmora]
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/35l7mfq.jpg[/img][/url]                    [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Altmora][b][i][img]http://i66.tinypic.com/35i9g7b.jpg[/img][/i][/b][/url]
[b][i]
[/i][/b]
[youtube]rzngjhh8UWE[/youtube]
[b][i]
[/i][/b][b]What features can you expect from this mod?[/b]

[b]- some hours playtime[/b]
[b]- a huge new world space with a lot of detail[/b]
[b]- nearly 40 handmade interior locations[/b]
[b]- custom NPCs, handmade, fully voiced[/b]
[b]- the original lore[/b]
[b]- main & side quests[/b]
[b]- textures [/b]
[b]- music, sounds[/b]
[b]- artwork
[/b]- scenes
- loadscreens
[b]- meshes, animated[/b]


[b]Wallpapers: [/b][url=http://imgur.com/a/dqV12][b]http://imgur.com/a/dqV12[/b][/url]


[b]FORUM  [/b][b]click:[/b][b]  [/b][b]FACEBOOK [/b][b]click:[/b][b] STEAM [/b][b]click: [/b]
[url=http://atmora-calling.freeforums.net/][img]http://i65.tinypic.com/dxjl0k.png[/img][/url]  [b]         [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/2h7gqdx.png[/img][/b][b]         [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/121xrmp.png[/img][/b][b][i] [/i][/b]

Download the files and install as usual.

[/b][img]http://i63.tinypic.com/20s5lv.png[/img]
[b][i][s][u]
[/u][/s][/i][/b][b]weare internally at merge 0.99; soon 1.00.[/b][b]
Our internal development is over 95% done.
[/b][b]
[/b][b]The version you can download, is 60% done and 18+months old;
[/b]and just uploaded here as a teaser for fans.
In this "teaser version" the quests[b] are deactivated to avoid spoilers,
[/b][b]and lots of new content is not included yet.
To get to Atmora in the "teaser version";
ingame use[/b][b] "^" [/b][b]and [/b][b]"coc"location" "[/b][b] ([/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68189/?tab=9&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodreadme%2F%3Fid%3D68189&pUp=1][b]here[/b][/url][b] are "location" names linked).[/b]
[b]


[/b][b][img]http://i68.tinypic.com/25imdfc.png[/img][/b]


[b]
[/b][b]No conflict was reported or experienced so far.[/b]
[b]


[/b][img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2rzc4lv.png[/img]

[b]
[/b][b]You can get help at our [/b][url=http://atmora-calling.freeforums.net/][b]forum[/b][/url][b], in the [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68189/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D68189%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D3074664&pUp=1][b]comments[/b][/url][b], in the [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68189/?tab=9&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodreadme%2F%3Fid%3D68189&pUp=1][b]readme-file[/b][/url][b],[/b]
[b]or if you contact us: Steam group "[/b][b]Atmora-calling[/b][b]"[/b]
[b]"[/b][b]Hannes821[/b][b]" or "Anathem7x" on theNexus/Steam. [/b]
[b]


[/b][img]http://i67.tinypic.com/95wfog.png[/img]



[b]We may allow using assets for other mods.[/b]
[b]If you see "Atmora" somewhere else, it was stolen.[/b]
[b]It will stay a nexus-exclusive free mod.
[/b]We will always respect the rights of all contributers and supporters.
